name: Apollo
opgAction: Once per game, gain 3 M€ for each tile on The Moon.
fullDescription: Once per game, gain 3 M€ for each tile on The Moon.

name: Asimov
opgAction: Once per game, draw 10-X awards (min. 1), where X is the current generation number. You may put one into the game and fund it for free.
ongoingEffect: You have +2 score for all awards.
fullDescription: Once per game, draw 10-X awards (min. 1), where X is the current generation number. You may put one into the game and fund it for free. | You have +2 score for all awards.

name: Bjorn
opgAction: Once per game, steal X+2 M€ from each player that has more M€ than you, where X is the current generation number.
fullDescription: Once per game, steal X+2 M€ from each player that has more M€ than you, where X is the current generation number.

name: Caesar
opgAction: Once per game, place X hazard tiles where X is the current generation number. Each opponent loses 1 unit of production of their choice, or 2 units if there are 6 or more hazard tiles.
fullDescription: Once per game, place X hazard tiles where X is the current generation number. Each opponent loses 1 unit of production of their choice, or 2 units if there are 6 or more hazard tiles.

name: Clarke
opgAction: Once per game, increase your plant and heat production 1 step each. Gain plants and heat equal to your production +4.
fullDescription: Once per game, increase your plant and heat production 1 step each. Gain plants and heat equal to your production +4.

name: CoLeadership
ongoingEffect: Draw 3 CEO cards and take one to your hand, it will be played on your first turn. Discard the other 2.
fullDescription: Draw 3 CEO cards and take one to your hand, it will be played on your first turn. Discard the other 2.

name: Duncan
opgAction: Once per game, gain 7-X VP and 4X M€, where X is the current generation number.
fullDescription: Once per game, gain 7-X VP and 4X M€, where X is the current generation number.

name: Ender
opgAction: Once per game, discard any number of cards up to twice the current generation number to draw that many cards.
fullDescription: Once per game, discard any number of cards up to twice the current generation number to draw that many cards.

name: Faraday
ongoingEffect: When you gain a multiple of 5 for any tag type IN PLAY, you may pay 3 M€ to draw a card with that tag. Wild tags do not count for this effect.
fullDescription: When you gain a multiple of 5 for any tag type IN PLAY, you may pay 3 M€ to draw a card with that tag. Wild tags do not count for this effect.

name: Floyd
opgAction: Once per game, play a card from hand for 13 + 2X M€ less, where X is the current generation number.
fullDescription: Once per game, play a card from hand for 13 + 2X M€ less, where X is the current generation number.

name: Gaia
opgAction: Once per game, gain the Ares adjacency bonuses of all player-owned tiles on Mars.
fullDescription: Once per game, gain the Ares adjacency bonuses of all player-owned tiles on Mars.

name: Gordon
ongoingEffect: Ignore placement restrictions for greenery and city tiles on Mars. Gain 2 M€ when you place a greenery or city tile on Mars.
fullDescription: Ignore placement restrictions for greenery and city tiles on Mars. | Gain 2 M€ when you place a greenery or city tile on Mars.

name: Greta
ongoingEffect: When you take an action or play a card that increases your TR THIS GENERATION (max 10 times), gain 4 M€.
fullDescription: When you take an action or play a card that increases your TR THIS GENERATION (max 10 times), gain 4 M€.

name: HAL9000
opgAction: Once per game, decrease each of your productions 1 step to gain 4 of that resource.
fullDescription: Once per game, decrease each of your productions 1 step to gain 4 of that resource.

name: Huan
ongoingEffect: ALL OPPONENTS CANNOT TRADE NEXT GENERATION. Gain 1 Trade Fleet.
fullDescription: ALL OPPONENTS CANNOT TRADE NEXT GENERATION. Gain 1 Trade Fleet.

name: Ingrid
ongoingEffect: When you take an action that places a tile on Mars THIS GENERATION, draw a card.
fullDescription: When you take an action that places a tile on Mars THIS GENERATION, draw a card.

name: Jansson
opgAction: Once per game, gain all placement bonuses under your tiles on Mars.
fullDescription: Once per game, gain all placement bonuses under your tiles on Mars.

name: Karen
opgAction: Once per game, draw Prelude cards equal to the current generation number and choose one to play, and discard the rest.
fullDescription: Once per game, draw Prelude cards equal to the current generation number and choose one to play, and discard the rest.

name: Lowell
opgAction: Once per game, pay 8 M€ to draw 3 CEO cards and choose one to play. Discard this card.
fullDescription: Once per game, pay 8 M€ to draw 3 CEO cards and choose one to play. Discard this card.

name: Maria
opgAction: Once per game, draw colony tiles equal to the current generation number. Put one into play and build a colony on it for free if possible.
fullDescription: Once per game, draw colony tiles equal to the current generation number. Put one into play and build a colony on it for free if possible.

name: Musk
opgAction: Once per game, discard any number of Earth cards to draw that many space cards, and gain that many units of titanium, plus 6.
fullDescription: Once per game, discard any number of Earth cards to draw that many space cards, and gain that many units of titanium, plus 6.

name: Naomi
opgAction: Once per game, move each colony tile track marker to its highest or lowest value.
ongoingEffect: When you build a colony, gain 2 energy and 3 M€.
fullDescription: Once per game, move each colony tile track marker to its highest or lowest value. | When you build a colony, gain 2 energy and 3 M€.

name: Neil
opgAction: Once per game, increase your M€ production by the value of the LOWEST Moon rate.
ongoingEffect: Gain 1 M€ when any player plays a Moon tag.
fullDescription: Once per game, increase your M€ production by the value of the LOWEST Moon rate. | Gain 1 M€ when any player plays a Moon tag.

name: Oscar
opgAction: Once per game, replace the Chairman with one of your delegates.
fullDescription: Once per game, replace the Chairman with one of your delegates. | You have +1 influence

name: Petra
opgAction: Once per game, replace all Neutral delegates with your delegates. Gain 3 M€ for each delegate replaced this way. Place 3 Neutral delegates.
fullDescription: Once per game, replace all Neutral delegates with your delegates. Gain 3 M€ for each delegate replaced this way. Place 3 Neutral delegates.

name: Quill
opgAction: Once per game, add 2 floaters to each of your cards that collect floaters, then add 2 floaters to ANY card. Gain 1 M€ for every 2 floaters added this way.
fullDescription: Once per game, add 2 floaters to each of your cards that collect floaters, then add 2 floaters to ANY card. Gain 1 M€ for every 2 floaters added this way.

name: Rogers
ongoingEffect: Ignore global requirements for your Venus cards THIS GENERATION. When you play a Venus tag THIS GENERATION, you pay 3 M€ less for it.
fullDescription: Ignore global requirements for your Venus cards THIS GENERATION. When you play a Venus tag THIS GENERATION, you pay 3 M€ less for it.

name: Ryu
opgAction: Once per game, swap up to X+2 units of production between two resources, where X is the current generation number.
fullDescription: Once per game, swap up to X+2 units of production between two resources, where X is the current generation number.

name: Shara
opgAction: Once per game, choose a planet tag. This card counts as having immediately played 2 of that tag. Then gain M€ equal to that tags planety influence track minus the current generation. Once per game, choose a planet tag. This card counts as having immediately played 2 of that tag. Then gain M€ equal to that tags planety influence track.
fullDescription: Once per game, choose a planet tag. This card counts as having immediately played 2 of that tag. Then gain M€ equal to that tags planety influence track minus the current generation. | Once per game, choose a planet tag. This card counts as having immediately played 2 of that tag. Then gain M€ equal to that tags planety influence track.

name: Stefan
opgAction: Once per game, sell any number of cards from your hand for 3 M€ each.
fullDescription: Once per game, sell any number of cards from your hand for 3 M€ each.

name: Tate
opgAction: Once per game, name a tag. Reveal cards from the deck until you find 5 cards with that tag. BUY up to 2 cards and discard the rest.
fullDescription: Once per game, name a tag. Reveal cards from the deck until you find 5 cards with that tag. BUY up to 2 cards and discard the rest.

name: Ulrich
opgAction: Once per game, gain 4 M€ for each ocean placed. If all oceans are aleady placed, gain only 15 M€.
fullDescription: Once per game, gain 4 M€ for each ocean placed. If all oceans are aleady placed, gain only 15 M€.

name: VanAllen
ongoingEffect: MILESTONES ALWAYS COST 0 M€ FOR YOU. When any milestone is claimed, gain 3 M€.
fullDescription: MILESTONES ALWAYS COST 0 M€ FOR YOU. | When any milestone is claimed, gain 3 M€.

name: Will
opgAction: Once per game, add the following resources to your cards: 2 animals, 2 microbes, 2 floaters, 2 wild.
fullDescription: Once per game, add the following resources to your cards: 2 animals, 2 microbes, 2 floaters, 2 wild.

name: Xavier
opgAction: Once per game, gain 2 wild tags for THIS GENERATION.
ongoingEffect: AFTER this action has been used, when playing a card with a requirement, you pay 1 M€ less for it.
fullDescription: Once per game, gain 2 wild tags for THIS GENERATION. | AFTER this action has been used, when playing a card with a requirement, you pay 1 M€ less for it.

name: Xu
opgAction: Once per game, gain 2 M€ for each Venus tag in play. Gain an additional 8 M€ if you have the most Venus tags in play.
fullDescription: Once per game, gain 2 M€ for each Venus tag in play. Gain an additional 8 M€ if you have the most Venus tags in play.

name: Yvonne
opgAction: Once per game, gain all your colony bonuses twice.
fullDescription: Once per game, gain all your colony bonuses twice.

name: Zan
opgAction: Once per game, place all of your available delegates in Reds. Gain 1 M€ for each delegate placed this way.
ongoingEffect: You are immune to Reds' ruling policy.
fullDescription: Once per game, place all of your available delegates in Reds. Gain 1 M€ for each delegate placed this way. | You are immune to Reds' ruling policy.
